import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Reorder custom field types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/types/re-order"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the display order for multiple custom field types. The order of IDs in the request array determines the new DisplayOrder values, allowing fine-grained control over how custom field types appear in the UI.

**Prerequisites**:
1. **CustomFieldTypeIds** - Obtain type UUIDs from [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types](/docs/api/custom-fields/list-custom-field-types) or [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-field-types)

**Workflow Example**:
1. List custom field types to get current order
2. Arrange CustomFieldTypeId values in desired display order
3. Submit the reordered array
4. Custom field types will be displayed in the specified order

**Minimal Required Fields**: Array of CustomFieldTypeId values in desired order (at least one ID required)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"Array of custom field type IDs in the desired display order. The order of IDs in the array determines the new DisplayOrder values assigned to each custom field type.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"minItems":1,"example":["027d9a34-c8b0-4dd3-86d9-badc9b95c547","e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","f4e5d6c7-b8a9-4102-a3b4-c5d6e7f89012"],"title":"CustomFieldTypeReorderRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
